title: Fix Footer Quick Actions icon duplication and button content centering

requirements.summary: Remove duplicate WhatsApp icon in Footer Quick Actions so only one icon is shown next to the label.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Footer Quick Actions section, the "Book via WhatsApp" button displays exactly one WhatsApp icon (not two).
The fix is implemented without adding any new image assets (use existing icon components only).
Other WhatsApp CTAs on the site (e.g., hero CTA, floating WhatsApp button) still render correctly and are not missing their intended icon.

file_operations.description: Remove the extra <SiWhatsapp> icon passed as a child to the Footer Quick Actions <WhatsAppLink> (since WhatsAppLink already renders a WhatsApp icon), and remove the unused SiWhatsapp import to ensure only one icon appears.

requirements.summary: Center the Footer Quick Actions Get Directions button content (icon + text) horizontally within the full-width button at all screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Footer Quick Actions section, the "Get Directions" button label is visually centered horizontally within the full-width button, including when an icon is present.
Button centering remains correct across common breakpoints (mobile and desktop) without changing the click behavior (still opens Google Maps in a new tab).

file_operations.description: Update the base button class list to include horizontal centering (e.g., add flex justification such as justify-center) so icon + text remain centered when the button is full width, while preserving the existing click behavior.

Verify the Footer Quick Actions <GetDirectionsLink> remains full-width and visually centered across breakpoints after the GetDirectionsLink centering adjustment, without changing navigation/routes or the Google Maps new-tab behavior.
